name: Thumbo
description:
One humble thumb, looking for love.
Dodge and weave your way to the ...

Controls
  • Right click - Floppy time
  • Left click - Bash
Other hand
  • Left Arrow - Shuffle left
  • Up Arrow - Boost
  • Right Arrow - Shuffle right
Hints

Most things change, but colors stay the same

Thumb's are breakable, using Bash too much may lead to loss limbs.

Source code on GitHub

Play in browser using WebGL (not recommended)

EDIT: Added web build after the jam ended
